name: Add new Eventbrite attendees to Google Sheets
description: Effortlessly manage your event attendee data with this template! Every time a new attendee registers for your event on Eventbrite, Make will automatically add their information to a designated row in Google Sheets. This streamlined workflow ensures that you have an organized and up-to-date list of attendees, making it easier to track participation and follow up after the event. Perfect for event organizers looking to enhance their data management and improve attendee engagement.
